If you create a new survey using a [template](getting-started.html#start-with-a-template), the `server()` function might look something like this:

```{r}
server <- function(input, output, session) {

  # Define conditional skip logic 
  # (skip forward to page if a condition is TRUE)
  sd_skip_if()

  # Define conditional display logic 
  # (show a question if a condition is TRUE)
  sd_show_if()

  # Main server to control the app
  sd_server(db = db)

}
```
